TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Color My World activity. In Color My World, you can color the countries of the world to create your own customized map of the world. You can also play a geography game and go on a virtual tour across the world
TutoModeContent:
Click here to select the mode of the activity.
You can either color countries by selecting Coloring (default), play a geography game by selecting Interactive, or go on a virtual tour across the world by selecting Tour.
You can also play on the entire world or just to focus a specific region of it
TutoColorContent: Click here to choose the current color to use to color countries
TutoRunContent: If you selected Interactive or Tour play mode, click here to start running the game
